name: tally-node
description: Tally Node - ESP32 LoRa Tally System

scripts.upload: . venv/bin/activate && cd web && npm run deploy && cd .. && pio run -t upload && pio device monitor
scripts.clean: . venv/bin/activate && cd web && npm run deploy && cd .. && pio run -t clean && pio run -t upload && pio device monitor
scripts.tx: . venv/bin/activate && cd web && npm run deploy && cd .. && pio run -e eora_s3_tx -t upload && pio device monitor
scripts.clean-tx: . venv/bin/activate && cd web && npm run deploy && cd .. && pio run -t erase && pio run -e eora_s3_tx -t clean && pio run -e eora_s3_tx -t upload && pio device monitor
scripts.rx: . venv/bin/activate && cd web && npm run deploy && cd .. && pio run -e eora_s3_rx -t upload && pio device monitor
scripts.clean-rx: . venv/bin/activate && cd web && npm run deploy && cd .. && pio run -t erase && pio run -e eora_s3_rx -t clean && pio run -e eora_s3_rx -t upload && pio device monitor
